title: Toothpicks
description: In this coding challenge, I implement Omar Polâ€™s fractal toothpick sequence.

timestamps.title: The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences
Each toothpick will have a length, center point, and direction
Create an array list of toothpicks
Add a toothpick at the center of the canvas
Create an array list to hold the next generation of toothpicks
Each toothpick checks whether its end points are free
Add a new toothpick at a free point
Optimize by only checking the new toothpicks
Dynamically adjust the scale of the toothpicks
Print the sequence to the console
